article_title: New CEO, CFO Chosen for Banco Espirito Santo
article_text:
Banco Espírito Santo SA's largest shareholder said Saturday that it has chosen an outsider to head the bank and the current head of Portugal's debt agency to become its chief financial officer, as it tries to distance the lender from troubles at its own controlling company.

The controlling company, Espírito Santo International SA, controls Espírito Santo Financial Group SA, which in turn holds 25% of the Portuguese lender.

article_summary:
The controlling company, Espírito Santo International SA, controls Espírito Santo Financial Group SA, which in turn holds 25% of the Portuguese lender.
Banco Espírito Santo SA's largest shareholder said Saturday that it has chosen an outsider to head the bank and the current head of Portugal's debt agency to become its chief financial officer, as it tries to distance the lender from troubles at its own controlling company.
